official_title: Joint resolution to authorize the President to enter into discussions and negotiations with Canada concerning the transportation of crude oil by pipeline through Canada to markets in the United States.

summary.text: Authorizes and requests the President to enter into further negotiations with Canada concerning the transportation of crude oil by pipeline through Canada to markets in the United States. Directs the President to report to Congress by June 30, 1978 on the progress of such negotiations. Prohibits any Federal agency from authorizing the construction or alteration of any terminal, dock, or other facility related to crude oil transportation in, or immediately adjacent to, or affecting the navigable waters of the State of Washington until June 30, 1978.

titles.title: Joint resolution to authorize the President to enter into discussions and negotiations with Canada concerning the transportation of crude oil by pipeline through Canada to markets in the United States.
